page.title: 07EVENTS
page.content: {The Rosedale Show}is an important annual event.It is held on the 3rd. Saturday in August,usually in the Milburn Arms field.Cows and sheep are exhibited.Horses of all types enter in Showing and Jumping Classes.Pigeons and Rabbits also feature well. In the main Tent the vegetables,fruit,flower vie for attention amongst the skillfully made soft and hard articles and the well made bread, cakes, jams, preserves, and wines. Photographs jostle with children's writing, art, models and collages. In the neighbouring tent various crafts people demonstrate their trade and sell their wares. Outside the Sheepdog Trials attract attention along with the Children's Fancy Dress, Terrier Races and Sports.An{Annual Christmas {Party }is held for the old and young.
